name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Call of Duty Black Ops 3 Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gear up for the intense action of Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 with a live wallpaper that brings futuristic warfare to your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the adrenaline-fueled battles of Black Ops 3, where advanced combat technology meets tactical brilliance. This live wallpaper captures the essence of the game, showcasing soldiers in high-tech gear, epic battlefields, and a world on the brink of chaos. Whether you're a fan of the campaign, multiplayer, or Zombies mode, this extension is the perfect way to channel your passion for the legendary FPS series every time you open a new tab.

üîç Google Search Bar: Stay connected to the web while enjoying the intense battlefield backdrop.
üïí Clock & Date Display: Keep track of time with a sleek, modern design.
üîó Customizable Shortcuts: Add your favorite sites for quick and easy access.
üîó Extension Management Links: Conveniently access "Remove Extension" and "More Extensions" options from the bottom left of the screen.
Fuel your love for gaming with the Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 Live Wallpaper‚Äîperfect for players who live for the thrill of futuristic warfare and legendary campaigns!
